issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Hi,

Since the last version of Appcelerator Studio (Today), all my projects won't work.

[ERROR] : Failed to encrypt JavaScript files
TRACE | titanium exited with exit code 1
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1

I have read many topics on Jira about this error but no solutions helped.

thanks

h3. Actual Result
[ERROR] : Failed to encrypt JavaScript files
TRACE | titanium exited with exit code 1
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1

h3. Expected Result
App work on Android

comments.body:
Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "encrypt JavaScript files" in Appcelerator Studio on Windows is working fine on following environment :

{code}
Windows 8.1
Titanium SDK build: 4.1.0 GA
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.1.201507141126
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 4.1.2
{code}

I recommend you upgrade development environment  and let us know if you get the error again.

Thanks
